quotes.message: In a world of lies and liars, an honest work of art is always an act of social responsibility.
quotes.name: Robert McKee

quotes.message: Without restoring an ethos of social responsibility, there can be no meaningful and sustained economic recovery.
quotes.name: Jeffrey Sachs

quotes.message: If you feel a sense of social responsibility, first of all keep working on yourself. Being peaceful yourself is the first step if you want to live in a peaceful universe.
quotes.name: Ram Dass

quotes.message: Corporate Social Responsibility is a hard-edged business decision. Not because it is a nice thing to do or because people are forcing us to do it because it is good for our business.
quotes.name: Niall FitzGerald

quotes.message: There is a social responsibility to take care of vulnerable people. It seems that a sensible social responsibility is obligatory education, but also decent education, and that is not happening.
quotes.name: Noam Chomsky

quotes.message: Social responsibility becomes an aspect not of Christian mission only, but also of Christian conversion. It is impossible to be truly converted to God without being thereby converted to our neighbor.
quotes.name: John Stott

quotes.message: Together with the social responsibility of businesses, there is also the social responsibility of consumers. Every person ought to have the awareness that 'purchasing is always a moral-and not simply an economic-act.
quotes.name: Pope Francis

quotes.message: Social responsibility above the level of family, or at most of tribe, requires imagination-- devotion, loyalty, all the higher virtues -- which a man must develop himself; if he has them forced down him, he will vomit them out.
quotes.name: Robert A. Heinlein

quotes.message: Corporate social responsibility is measured in terms of businesses improving conditions for their employees, shareholders, communities, and environment. But moral responsibility goes further, reflecting the need for corporations to address fundamental ethical issues such as inclusion, dignity, and equality.
quotes.name: Klaus Schwab

quotes.message: We have an unwavering commitment to our social responsibility program; it's good for business, and we know it's the right thing to do.
quotes.name: Robert J. Fisher

quotes.message: The concept of corporate social responsibility (CSR) has long been used as an effective lens through which to examine the actions business can take toward ensuring mutual long-term well-being and sustainability.
quotes.name: Klaus Schwab

quotes.message: If we don't take responsiblity of what happens to our society, then no amount of Independence can improve human condition.
quotes.name: Abhijit Naskar

quotes.message: I believe social responsibility begins with a strong, competitive company. Only a healthy enterprise can improve and enrich the lives of people and their communities.
quotes.name: Jack Welch

quotes.message: The world howls for social justice, but when it comes to social responsibility, you sometimes cant even hear crickets chirping.
quotes.name: Dean Koontz

quotes.message: The main social responsibility for a company is to win.
quotes.name: Jack Welch

quotes.message: A tremendous social responsibility comes with being a successful public performer.
quotes.name: A. Bartlett Giamatti

quotes.message: The voluntary approach to corporate social responsibility has failed in many cases.
quotes.name: David Suzuki

quotes.message: We need to get back to a level of social responsibility that we haven't seen for a long time.
quotes.name: Billy Corgan

quotes.message: We, as humans, have actually developed a sense of social responsibility. We have gone beyond our basic instincts.
quotes.name: Jane Goodall

quotes.message: We all have a social responsibility and have to be mindful of what we do and say.
quotes.name: Aja Brown
